Shadai:
Do you have the Elegant Brooch of Lavirosis? In this case, the brooch can be improved and make it dazzling! A dazzling Brooch can be enchanted with the help of Spirit Stone for the Dazzling Brooch! Well? Impressive, is not it?
And if you also have and Gem for Dazzling Brooch, then you can make a dazzling Brooch even stronger! Improvement can give her rare spells!
But this requires special material. It is called Powder from the Precious Stone Lavianroz.If you bring me 1 Grindstone, and Casket with Gems or Precious Stone Level 1, I will exchange them for Powder from the Precious Stone. And by the way, the type of gemstone does not matter.
